name: Food Fight (itch) (NickMckinnis)
description:
I am excited to share a video and playable demo of my upcoming mobile game!

I wanted a chance to create cute characters interacting in a light hearted, yet strategic setting.

I drew on a number of influences while working on this game and think I have settled on an aesthetic that works well. I am finalizing some elements of the game before moving forward with a mobile release and I couldn't be more excited.

Feel free to send me any feedback! I appreciate any chance to improve!
